segments.text: You're really fit , Paul . Do you exercise very much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I almost always get up very early , and I lift weights for an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . And then I often go Rollerblading .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! How often do you exercise like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About five times a week . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I hardly ever exercise . I usually just watch TV in my free time . I guess I'm a real couch potato !
segments.speaker: S1
